but don sweat it especially with new baby 32 weeks pregnant here frequently give my almost two year old dry cereal and sippy cup of milk my back hurts really bad most mornings and don feel like sitting at the table helping him eat cereal no regrets you fed two kids today keep up the good work they sure have power over us got little snippy with my sd10 because she took the exact leftovers which had been planning on eating since last night for lunch normally not big deal but 23 weeks pregnant and having some emotional control food issues not even sure if she noticed my change in tone
